title: Roasted Turkey, Apple, and Cheddar Sandwich
directions: Make the Honey mustard by mixing together the honey and mustard. Spread on all 8 slices of bread.
Layer 4 slices of bread with the turkey, apple, cheese, onion, and lettuce. Place remaining 4 slices of bread on top of sandwiches and slice. Serve.
ingredients: 4 ounces of sharp white cheddar cheese, sliced
1 gala apple, thinly sliced (or other sweet apple)
8 pieces of lettuce, about size of bread
8-10 ounces thick sliced roasted turkey breast
